feat.name: Valiant
entries: You are unshaken by overwhelming odds. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you succeed on a saving throw, allies within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against the same effect for 1 minute.

If three or more hostile creatures are within 5 feet of you and one of these creatures attack rolls miss you, all creatures within 5 feet of you have disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.
